channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 06:08 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 06:08 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.#Poltava_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 05:02 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Highorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_.
